      • getStateSpace

        public StateSpace getStateSpace()

      • getPredator

        public Predator getPredator()

      • simulate

        public void simulate(double episodeCount,
            java.lang.String filePrefix)
        Runs many simulations and outputs the number of rounds it takes for the predator to catch the prey on each simulation (less is better), in a .csv file. It is used for evaluating learning algorithms. - New round when both prey and predator move.
        Parameters:
        episodeCount - The number of episodes to be run.
        filePrefix - The prefix of the .csv file to be created.

        public void valueIterationGammas()
        increases gamma with step 0.001. Outputs to results.csv. Used for plotting.

      • getSimulationAverageRounds

        public double getSimulationAverageRounds(double episodeCount)
        Runs many simulations and returns the number of rounds it takes for the predator to catch the prey on average for all simulations (less is better). It is used for evaluating learning algorithms. - New round when both prey and predator move.
        Parameters:
        episodeCount - The number of episodes to be run.

      • Q_Learning

        public Q Q_Learning(EpsilonGreedyPolicy pi,
           double initialQ,
           double alpha,
           double gamma,
           int episodeCount)
        Implementation of the Q-Learning algorithm.
        Parameters:
        pi - The epsilon-greedy policy that will be gradually updated within the algorithm according to the Q values
        initialQ - Initial value for Q.
        alpha - Learning rate.
        gamma - Decay factor.
        Returns:
